poem_en:
Memory's gentle tears create soft shadows
Mountains ancient softly guide roads lead hope
Echoes gently carve memories
Now petals softly fall
Distant voices tremble low
Embers quietly warm rooms
poem_it:
Memoria slow lacrime fanno ombre softly arte
Montagne sing dolcemente lungo antico streets speranza
Echi wrap sbiadite footprints scolpite inside cuore
Ora petals cadono without sussurrate sweet sogni
Distante souls tremano under crepuscolo dark cieli
Braci burn piano through silenziose rooms memoria
